Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Topical fluorouracil is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Actinic keratosis. This use is approved for the Carac, Efudex, Fluoroplex, and Tolak brands of topical fluorouracil.

Section.Para: The Efudex brand of topical fluorouracil is also used to treat basal cell carcinoma that is superficial. It is used in patients whose tumors cannot be treated with conventional therapy.
Fluorouracil is also available in an injection form. For more information, see the Drug Information Summary for Fluorouracil Injection.
